#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int main()
{
	char k[1000005];
	char *ans;
	ans=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*100000000);
	int res,t,sz,i,n,len;
	int z,test;
	scanf("%d",&test);
 
	for(z=0;z<test;z++)
	{
	strcpy(ans,"");
	scanf("%d",&n);
	scanf("%s",k);
	t=0;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
	t+=sprintf(ans+t,"%d",i);
	}
	sz=strlen(k);
	len=strlen(ans);
	res=0;
	for(i=0;i<len-sz+1;i++)
	{
		if(strncmp(&ans[i],k,sz)==0)
			res++;
	}
	printf("%d\n",res);
	}
	return 0;
}
